content: chain 3 turn 68 double_crochet and a chain 2 space row 17- double_crochet in first stitch double_crochet in the next 33 stitches cs double_crochet in next 33 stitches 2 double_crochet in the last stitch chain 3 turn 72 double_crochet and a chain 2 space copyright © by pixie hollow yarn designs 2020 please do not alter this pattern or share as your own please credit pixie hollow yarn designs as the creator of this pattern when possible row 18- double_crochet in first stitch double_crochet in the next 35 stitches cs double_crochet in next 35 stitches 2 double_crochet in the last stitch chain 3 turn 76 double_crochet and a chain 2 space row 19- double_crochet in first stitch double_crochet in the next 37 stitches cs double_crochet in next 37 stitches 2 double_crochet in the last stitch chain 3 turn 80 double_crochet and a chain 2 space row 20- double_crochet in first stitch double_crochet in the next 39 stitches cs double_crochet in next 39 stitches 2 double_crochet in the last stitch chain 3 turn 84 double_crochet and a chain 2 space row 21- double_crochet in first stitch fpdc in the next 41 stitches cs fpdc in next 41 stitches 2 double_crochet in the last stitch chain 3 turn 6dc 82 fpdc and a chain 2 space row 22- double_crochet in first stitch double_crochet in the next 43 stitches cs double_crochet in next 43 stitches 2dc in the last stitch slipstitch to the top of the chain 3 at the beginning of the row 92 double_crochet and a chain 2 space with pattern facing out rs we will continue but working in the round fpdc will be replaced with bpdc if working with a smaller hook and after joining you find it is too snug repeat row 22 as many times as you need round 23- chain 3 counts as first double_crochet we will not be increasing by making our first double_crochet in the same stitch double_crochet in the next 46 stitches until corner cs double_crochet in the next 46 stitches join to the top of the chain 3 with a slipstitch 94 double_crochet and a chain 2 space round 24- chain 1 bpdc in same stitch as the chain 1 bpdc in each stitch until corner cs bpdc around join with a slipstitch to first bpdc 2 double_crochet 94 bpdc and a chain 2 space round 25- chain 3 double_crochet in each stitch until corner cs double_crochet around join with a slipstitch to the top of the chain 3 98 double_crochet and a chain 2 space round 26- chain 3 double_crochet and sl puff in same stitch as the chain 3 *skip next stitch double_crochet and sl puff in next stitch* repeat until corner cs *double_crochet and sl puff in next stitch skip next stitch* repeat to end slipstitch to chain 3 to join 3 double_crochet 50 sl puffs and a chain 2 space round 27- chain 3 double_crochet around until corner cs double_crochet around slipstitch to chain 3 to join cut
